title.rendered: Best 6 Furniture WordPress themes for WooCommerce

content.rendered:
WordPress platform is used more and more, therefore it has grown consequently the number of eCommerce sites built with WooCommerce. In this article you will find a list of the best furniture WordPress themes. Associated by their minimal and clean design, which try to create a new modern style and at the same time a simpler / better user experience.
If you are looking for a furniture theme on WooCommerce (or just some inspiration for an eCommerce project), this article is for you!

Schön – Modern, Clean & Responsive WooCommerce Theme


The first theme of our list is Schön, which is a WooCommerce theme designed in a very modern and minimal way. It has been published quite recently but it has quickly gained love from its customers with a review rate of 5/5 stars. It’s a clean and minimal design that makes it perfect, not only for furniture sites, but also for any other kind of online shops.
Schön provides many interesting features such as megamenu, color swatches, wishlist, compare list, header & footer customizable, Revolution Slider, WPML ready, and Drag & Drop page builder. However, one of the most innovative features of Schön is its banners system integrated with Visual Composer, which allows you to create super customizable banners using the most famous Drag & Drop plugin for WordPress (you can see Schön – Modern, Clean & Responsive WooCommerce Theme).
Another reason which leads some love from its customers is that this WooCommerce theme is fully responsive and well supported by any browsers; in addition, the theme includes for free many premium plugins worthing about $78, which is actually more than the cost of the theme itself.

SNS Anton – Furniture WooCommerce WordPress Theme


In the second position of our list, there is SNS Anton, it’s a very new theme, without reviews yet, but it has been developed by an elite author, which usually is a sign of quality.
It has a very nice design, clean and simple for the users who browse the pages. It also has many interesting features such as, lazy loading for the product images, 3 different zoom types, color or image swatches, one click demo install, many layouts for articles, pages or products.
In addition, it includes Revolution slider and Bakery Visual composer plugins for free.

Dash – Handmade Furniture Marketplace Theme


Dash is another WordPress theme which allows to create an online store for your furniture business using WooCommerce. It’s designed with a very nice and efficient style and provides many interesting shortcodes and widgets, which will allow you to create a nice website for your customers within a couple minutes.
In addition to the documentation, the author of the theme also provides some video tutorials, which are always appreciated if you are not so good with WordPress. The theme also includes Revolution Slider and a page builder (but isn’t specified what plugin it is exactly).

VG Cendo – WooCommerce WordPress Theme for Furniture Stores


VG Cendo is a WooCommerce theme designed with a modern style first, with many nice transition effects. With an average rating of 4.5/5, it seems quite appreciated by its customers though.
It includes many premium plugins for free (most of them are builded by the same author). It provides a powerful options panel, which allows to customize the theme deeply and easily.
In addition, it is periodically updated, in order to keep integration with new versions of WordPress, WooCommerce or other plugins.

Furniture – WooCommerce WordPress Theme


Furniture isn’t a recent theme like the others, it has been published in July 2015, but its author took care of it by providing periodical updates in order to keep the theme competitive. It also has an average rating of 5/5 (on only 3 ratings yet), and many sales.
This theme seems to provide a very good options panel, Revolution slider and Visual composer included for free (which seems to be a must nowadays), and 30+ shortcodes.

Mobilia – Furniture WooCommerce WordPress Theme


Last, but not least, there is Mobilia, a young theme with a quite clean design. It provides many interesting features, such as sliders, mega menu, page builder, wishlist, compare, quick view and 4 home pages.
It is also responsive, quite cross-browser (about IE, not earlier than 10) and WPML ready.

Conclusion

My list of WooCommerce themes for furniture eCommerce ends here. I hope you like it and that you have found something useful for your next eCommerce project, or maybe just an inspiration for something to add to your next project.
If you liked it, or if you think that something should be improved in this list, let me know in the comments area underneath.
